name: polytechnic-sis
description: Polytechnic Student Information System - MERN Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../user-app && npm install && cd ../admin-app && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix user-app" "npm run dev --prefix admin-app"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix user-app && npm run build --prefix admin-app
scripts.test: concurrently "npm test --prefix backend" "npm test --prefix user-app" "npm test --prefix admin-app"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix backend" "npm run lint --prefix user-app" "npm run lint --prefix admin-app"
